*Note: If you don't care about what's happening.. read no further, because it's all I talk about.

Fetal Development:

As our baby continues to develop, the vocal cords begin to form. The face is looking more and more human each day as the eyes begin to move closer together instead of being on the sides of the head and the ears move to a normal position. It would be possible now to determine the baby's sex by looking at the genitals if we could only get close enough. (We usually can't "guess" via ultrasound until around the 16th week.) The intestines move farther into the baby's body; the liver begins to secrete bile and the pancreas begins to produce insulin. A very busy week indeed!

 

Ideas for Dad:
Welcome to the second trimester Dad! The next few months are the easiest of the pregnancy. Mom is feeling better, the hormones have settled in, and she's not huge and uncomfortable yet. Celebrate the completion of your first trimester with a special date.

People who are completely self-focused and are only focused on their life dramas... ie... which boy doens't like me... or whoa's me... I have to have a boys attention to feel complete... So I act civil, and really don't give a shit about their stupid dramas in which they think the world should stop for.

They may think that I've been acting weird lately... well, they're right. So, they don't do anything.. don't acknowledge anything. Which pisses me off some, becaue I've called to check up on them when they were going through something in life. Once again, they only really care about themselves... and I'm done with those people. 
 
And I don't care about pissing people off anymore. I really don't. 


I've realized I'm gonig to miss my family terribly... my first family and my second, the lafonds. Beth, you've been and are the greatest friend anyone could ask for. I love you with all my heart... and I mean it when I say that all I want for you to be is competley happy.

Anyway, anyone else out there... I love you all. This isn't my goodbye to Lj.. but to the Sham.

Since I'm bored... time for a joke. So there was a guy named Mike, he called into the radio station to play a game to win a trip the the Bahamas. But this was no regular game... this was a game for married people. And Mike was married to Sara.

Radio Station: Hello, what's your name son, and are you ready to hear what this game is about?

Mike: Sure, my name is Mike

Radio Station: You're married, right Mike? Cause you have to be to play this game.

Mike: Yes, I am. To Sara.

Radio Station: Alright Mike, here's the rules, we're going to ask you 3 questions, and after you've answered the questions... we're going to call your wife up at work and ask her those 3 questions. If you can answer them the same you're on your way to the Bahamas!

Mike: Sounds fun, I think we can do it.

Radio Station: Okay Mike, are you ready for your first question?

Mike: Lets do this.

Radio Station: When was the last time you had sex with your wife?

Mike: Oh shit, she's going to kill me. She's going to kill me. She's going to be so mad I'm telling a radio station this.

Radio Station: Mike, come on man, it is for a free trip to the Bahamas... how mad could she possibly get?

Mike: Alright, well it was this morning before we left for work.

Radio Station: That a boy Mike! Way to get some early morning breakfast! Are you ready for the second question?

Mike: This is nuts. Sure.

Radio Station: Okay Mike, how long did it last?

Mike: Oh man, this is just going to get worse and worse, isn't it?

Radio Station: Do you want the trip to the Bahamas or not, Mike?

Mike: Alright, alright, fifteen minutes.

Radio Station: Well, at least you're an honest man Mike, I don't think anyone would lie about that time.

Mike: Yeah yeah, lets just hear the 3rd one to get this over with.

Radio Station: Okay Mike, last one. Where did you have sex with your wife this morning?

Mike: Christ, she is really going to kill me now. But let me explain, her mother is in town so we don't get much privacy right now.

Radio Station: Just tell us where Mike.

Mike: The kitchen table.

Radio Station: (cheers and laughter) Alright, time to call up Sara and see if she can answer the same questions the same way you did. If she does, you've won yourselves a trip to the Bahamas!

(Phone Rings)

Sara: JcPenny's, this is Sara speaking.

Radio Station: Hello Sara, this is KRLX radio station, are you familiar with our married couple game in order to win a trip to the Bahamas?

Sara: Well, I've heard of it.

Radio Station: Well, Mike called in this morning and we asked him 3 questions. We are going to ask you the same three questions and if you can answer them the same way, you two will be on your way to the Bahamas. But First, Mike would you like to say anything to your wife?

Mike: Sara, please just be completely honest, you night get mad at me... but it's a trip to the Bahamas baby.

Radio Station: Sara are you ready?

Sara: Probably not, but okay.

Radio Station: When was the last time you had sex?

Sara: What?! Mike, what the hell have you told these people. Oh my god, oh my god, oh my god.

Mike: Just be honest honey. It's a trip.

Sara: (takes a deep breath) This morning.

Radio Sation: ding ding ding! You've gotten the first question right, just two more to go. Are you ready?

Sara: Fine, lets just get this over with.

Radio Station: How long did the sex last?

Sara: Ummm, well. Lets see here, maybe, I guess I'd say 20 minutes.

Radio Station: Well, we'll give you that. Just because you're being nice and trying to not humiliate your husband on the radio. He said 15 minutes, but we're going to give you this question. So, Ding Ding Ding... one more question to go, and you'll be on your way to the Bahamas. Are you ready for the last question Sara?

Sara: (sounds not very amused) Lets do it.

Radio Station: Okay Sara, for a trip to the Bahamas, where did you have sex this morning?

Sara: What?! What the fuck Mike? You told the radio station this? I swear to God you're sleeping on the couch tonight. (She yells more.. but most of it has to be beeped out)

Mike: Sara, I know you're upset, but it's a free trip baby. Just be honest, please just be honest. It'd be so nice to get away with you to the Bahamas.

Radio Station: So what's it going to be Sara? Are you going to answer the question? Where did you have sex this morning?

Sara: I can't believe you did this to me Mike. I can't believe you.

Radio Station: Sara, are you going to answer, or do you want to quit the game?

Sara: (quiet for a couple of seconds) Okay. I'll answer.

Radio Station: For a trip to the Bahamas, where did you have sex this morning, Sara?

Sara: In the ass.

(Long radio pause and silence)

Radio Station: (laughing so fucking hard) We'll be back after this commerical break.
